title: Knittel's Restaurant Kreuzberg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located inside Hotel Kreuzberg. Offers clearly marked vegan choices, plus they will happily and easily create a custom meal for vegans. The dish of the day for lunch is actually a variety of a few dishes, with always one being vegan. The regular menu has at least two vegan choices, labelled as such. Vegan cappuccino and latte (with coconut milk) and vegan sorbet for dessert are available. The food is a mix of German and international dishes, with lots of fresh vegetables and unusual creations.
